column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For dinner we had the short rib stroganoff and southern style fried chicken. The pasta was very good
column2: but obviously fairly decadent. You'll want to be very hungry if ordering this dish. The fried chicken was good and not too greasy. It's mostly dark meat
column3: so if you prefer white meat
column4: I'd reconsider. We also got the elote corn (awesome
column5: but rich) and mashed potatoes (rich as well
